extensionDescription.message: Блокирует сайты в поисковой выдаче Google

error.description: Error message. '$1' will be replaced with the actual error.

unauthorizedError.message: Ошибка авторизации. Пожалуйста, выключите синхронизацию и включите снова.
unauthorizedError.description: Error message shown when unauthorized to access a cloud service.

content_singleSiteBlocked.description: Message shown when one site is blocked.

content_multipleSitesBlocked.description: Message shown when multiple sites are blocked. '$1' will be replaced with the count.

content_showBlockedSitesLink.description: Link text to show blocked sites.

content_hideBlockedSitesLink.description: Link text to hide blocked sites.

content_blockSiteLink.description: Link text to block a site.

content_unblockSiteLink.description: Link text to unblock a site.

popup_blockSiteTitle.description: Title of the popup to block a site.

popup_unblockSiteTitle.description: Title of the popup to unblock a site.

popup_details.description: Title of the details disclosure widget.

popup_pageURLLabel.description: Label for the textarea showing the page URL.

popup_pathDepth.description: Label for the input showing the path depth for rules to be added.

popup_pageTitleLabel.description: Label for the textarea showing the page title.

popup_addedRulesLabel.description: Label for the textarea showing rules to be added.

popup_removedRulesLabel.description: Label for the textarea showing rules to be removed.

popup_blockSiteButton.description: Text for the button to block a site.

popup_unblockSiteButton.description: Text for the button to unblock a site.

popup_openOptionsLink.description: Link text to open the options page.

popup_active.description: Message indicating the extension is active.

popup_inactive.description: Message indicating the extension is inactive.

popup_activateButton.description: Text for the button to activate the extension.

options_blacklistLabel.message: Выбранные сайты не будут отображаться в поисковой выдаче Google

options_blacklistHelper.description: Helper text for the blacklist textarea.

options_blacklistExample.description: Example of a rule. '$1' will be replaced with an example rule.

options_blockByTitle.message: Чтобы блокировать сайты по заголовку страницы, добавьте «title» к регулярным выражениям.
options_blockByTitle.description: Description of the title blocking feature.

options_blacklistUpdated.description: Message indicating the blacklist has been updated.

options_reloadBlacklistButton.description: Text for the button to reload the blacklist.

options_importBlacklistButton.description: Text for the button to import a blacklist.

options_exportBlacklistButton.description: Text for the button to export a blacklist.

options_saveBlacklistButton.description: Text for the button to save the blacklist.

options_importBlacklistDialog_title.description: Title of the import blacklist dialog.

options_importBlacklistDialog_fromFile.description: Label for the option to import from a file.

options_importBlacklistDialog_selectFile.description: Text for the button to select a file to import.

options_importBlacklistDialog_fromPB.description: Label for the option to import from Personal Blocklist.

options_importBlacklistDialog_pbLabel.description: Label for the textarea to import from Personal Blocklist (for accessibility).

options_importBlacklistDialog_append.description: Text for the checkbox to append to the existing blacklist.

options_importBlacklistDialog_importButt.description: Text for the import button in the import blacklist dialog.

options_importBlacklistDialog_helper.message: Вставьте список доменов из Personal Blocklist.
options_importBlacklistDialog_helper.description: Helper text for the textarea in the import blacklist dialog.

options_otherSearchEngines.description: Title of the section for other search engines.

options_otherSearchEnginesDescription.message: Вы можете использовать расширение с другими поисковыми системами.
options_otherSearchEnginesDescription.description: Description of the section for other search engines.

options_registerSearchEngine.description: Text for the button to enable a search engine.

options_searchEngineRegistered.description: Message indicating a search engine is enabled.

options_skipBlockDialogLabel.description: Label for the switch to skip the block dialog.

options_blockWholeSiteLabel.message: Добавить правила, блокирующие целые сайты по умолчанию
options_blockWholeSiteLabel.description: Label for the switch to block the whole site by default.

options_blockWholeSiteDescription.message: Например, для блокировки страницы "https://a.b.example.uk.com/", необходимо добавить правило "*://*.example.uk.com/*".
options_blockWholeSiteDescription.description: Description of the block whole site feature.

options_colorUseDefault.description: Label for the radio button to use the default color.

options_colorSpecify.description: Label for the radio button to specify a custom color.

options_highlightDescription.message: Чтобы выделить результаты поиска цветом N, добавьте к правилам "@N".

options_highlightColorNth.description: Name of the nth highlight color. '$1' will be replaced with the color number.

options_highlightColorAdd.description: Label for the button to add a highlight color.

options_highlightColorRemove.description: Label for the button to remove a highlight color.

options_dialogTheme.message: Тема диалога "Заблокировать сайт" в результатах поиска

options_dialogThemeDefault.description: Label for the radio button to use the default dialog theme.

options_dialogThemeLight.description: Label for the radio button to use the light theme.

options_dialogThemeDark.description: Label for the radio button to use the dark theme.

options_syncFeatureUpdated.message: Функция синхронизации была обновлена. Чтобы продолжить использование синхронизации, нажмите кнопку "Включить синхронизацию".
options_syncFeatureUpdated.description: Message indicating the sync feature has been updated.

options_syncFeature.description: Label for the switch to enable cloud sync.

options_turnOnSyncDialog_useAltFlow.description: Label for the switch to use the alternative authentication flow.

options_turnOnSyncDialog_altFlowDescript.message: У Вас могут попросить разрешение на доступ к $1 перед аутентификацией, но ваша личная информация НЕ будет храниться в этом домене.

options_turnOffSync.description: Text for the button to turn off sync.

options_syncGeneral.description: Label for the switch to sync general settings.

options_syncAppearance.description: Label for the switch to sync appearance.

options_syncSubscriptions.description: Label for the switch to sync subscriptions.

options_syncInterval.description: Label for the select to choose a sync interval.
